channel.title: 2.3. Makefile on 清水的小站
channel.description: Recent content in 2.3. Makefile on 清水的小站

item.title: 2.3.1 案例Makefile 1
item.description: 案例 # See LICENSE for licensing information. DIALYZER = dialyzer REBAR = rebar APPNAME = goldrush all: app app: deps @$(REBAR) compile deps: @$(REBAR) get-deps clean: @$(REBAR) clean rm -f test/*.beam rm -f erl_crash.dump tests: clean app eunit ct eunit: @$(REBAR) -C rebar.test.config eunit skip_deps=true ct: @$(REBAR) -C rebar.test.config ct skip_deps=true build-plt: @$(DIALYZER) --build_plt --output_plt .$(APPNAME)_dialyzer.plt \ --apps kernel stdlib sasl inets crypto public_key ssl compiler syntax_tools dialyze: @$(DIALYZER)
